articles.author: Brad Lendon, CNN
articles.title: Americans urged to leave Ukraine immediately as new Russian attacks feared
articles.description: The US government is urging Americans in Ukraine to leave the country immediately, warning that Russia is stepping up efforts to launch attacks on civilian infrastructure and government facilities in the coming days.
articles.content: (CNN)The US government is urging Americans in Ukraine to leave the country immediately, warning that Russia is stepping up efforts to launch attacks on civilian infrastructure and government faciliti… [+3559 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Trump turns his legal battle after FBI search into political rallying cry
articles.description: Donald Trump's new lawsuit over the FBI search of his Florida resort codifies his political fury into a legal strategy and implicitly spells out how the ex-President intends to exploit the drama as a springboard for his likely 2024 White House bid.

articles.title: 'I wish we could do something different': Mom trains her kid on how to use a bulletproof backpack - CNN Video
articles.description: A young mom in Oklahoma bought her child a bulletproof backpack insert and videotaped herself training him on how to use it. The video went viral on TikTok with parents expressing praise and experts urging caution.

articles.author: Analysis by Allison Morrow, CNN Business
articles.title: Analysis: Bosses don't need to freak out about 'quiet quitting'
articles.description: All right: Let's talk about "quiet quitting," the buzzy catch-all phrase that's not so quietly taken over work culture conversations in recent weeks.

articles.author: MJ Lee, Phil Mattingly
articles.title: White House leaning toward canceling $10,000 in student loan debt for borrowers who make less than $125,000
articles.description: White House officials have been weighing -- and leaning toward -- the cancellation of up to $10,000 in student loan debt per borrower tied to an income threshold, CNN has learned.
articles.content:
White House officials have been weighing and leaning toward the cancellation of up to $10,000 in student loan debt per borrower tied to an income threshold, CNN has learned.

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Why teachers seem more willing to go on strike
articles.description: Teachers are on strike in Columbus, Ohio, demanding functioning air conditioning. In Philadelphia, it's mostly bus drivers and other workers who want better wages and training. There's a national narrative of teachers and support staff who feel underpaid and …

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Stocks tumble on fears of another big Fed rate hike
articles.description: So much for hopes that the Federal Reserve will tap the brakes on its aggressive interest rate hikes. Stocks tumbled Monday as investors once again began to worry that the central bank will raise rates by three-quarters of a point next month.

articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: Even scientists didn't expect Webb telescope images of Jupiter to be this good
articles.description: Data has traveled across the solar system to make it into the James Webb Space Telescope, and now we get a better look at the planet Jupiter. NASA shared images of the gas giant's colorful auroras, giant storms and faint rings.
articles.content:
(CNN)Rainbow auroras, giant storms and far-off galaxies are all on display in the latest images of Jupiter from NASA's James Webb Space Telescope.
"We hadn't really expected it to be this good, to b… [+2542 chars]

articles.author: Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: Quiet quitting is the latest workplace trend, but it doesn't mean what you think
articles.description: After years of being overworked, many employees are trying quiet quitting, the act of doing your job responsibilities and nothing more. Experts share how to use it to improve your work life, plus what to be wary of.

articles.title: This could be a momentous week for millions of young people
